trans-unit.source: Represents the typed value of a validated XML element or attribute.
The XmlAtomicValue class cannot be inherited.
Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node or an atomic value.
The IsNode property always returns `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the validated XML element or attribute is an atomic value.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the validated XML element or attribute.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the validated XML element or attribute.
Gets the current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate Microsoft .NET Framework type according to its schema type.

If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the TypedValue property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Value%2A> property.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.
Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the validated XML element or attribute.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the validated XML element or attribute.
Returns the validated XML element or attribute's value as the type specified using the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
The ValueAs method attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type specified.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The type to return the validated XML element or attribute's value as.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
The value of the validated XML element or attribute as the type requested.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.

The ValueAsBoolean property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Boolean>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Boolean> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Boolean> is not valid.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.

The ValueAsDateTime property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.DateTime> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.DateTime> is not valid.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Double>.

The ValueAsDouble property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Double> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref:System.Double>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Double> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Double> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.

The ValueAsInt property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Int32> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref:System.Int32>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int32> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int32> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.

The ValueAsLong property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Int64> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref:System.Int64>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref:System.Int64> type.
The attempted cast to <xref:System.Int64> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Gets the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
The ValueType property gets the .NET Framework type of the typed value of the validated XML element or attribute.
For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a ValueType of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
However, the ValueType could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.
For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
The default value is <xref:System.String>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the validated XML element or attribute.
The XmlType property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the validated XML element or attribute.
For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the validated XML element or attribute.
